title: ‘Gogglebox Australia’ Is Casting Again So Grab The Funniest Kent You Know And Apply
text:
Channel 10 is absolutely gearing up for a tonne of shows next year, re: Australian Survivor, Survivor All Stars, Masterchef, and all the Bachies. And now, casting has officially kicked off for a new season of Gogglebox Australia. Hell yes.

Look, if you’ve turned to your mate at least once during a Gogglebox binge and been like, “I reckon we’d crush this”, then now’s the time to walk the talk. Just do it. What’s the worst that could happen? You end up on Bachie? Ha.

Per the casting call details, Gogglebox Australia is on the hunt for households of different ages, backgrounds, and make up. You’ve got to be an Australian citizen or permanent resident, and you’ve got to be based in Sydney, Brisbane, the Gold Coast, or Melbourne.

Also, your application must include a video, about two to four minutes long, of your humble abode and yourselves so the producers can suss out if you’re the right fit/actually funny.

You can suss out the details/apply right HERE.

Gogglebox Casting Call Do you think you'd be the perfect couch critic for our next season of Gogglebox Australia? Then what are you waiting for? Apply now at: http://goggleboxcasting.com.au Posted by Channel 10 on Saturday, 12 October 2019

Meanwhile on Channel 10, Gogglebox legend Angie Kent‘s journey on The Bachelorette just kicked off. The Masked Singer is still going but I’m pretty sure it wraps up soon. Then, The Amazing Race Australia begins. The content, it never ends.
description: Casting has officially kicked off for Gogglebox Australia. In other words, it's finally your time to shine on the small screen.
